member.name: T:Dzonny.JScriptNet.Jsc
member.summary: Wraps JScript.NET compiler as MSBuild task

member.name: P:Dzonny.JScriptNet.Jsc.Out
member.summary: Gets or sets name of binary output file
member.value: If not specified output file name is inferred from first file name

member.name: P:Dzonny.JScriptNet.Jsc.JscExe
member.summary: Gets or sets path to JScript.NET compiler
member.value: By default points to relative path of jsc.exe depending on jsce.exe being in PATH

member.name: P:Dzonny.JScriptNet.Jsc.Target
member.summary: Gets or sets type of targe binary

member.name: P:Dzonny.JScriptNet.Jsc.Platform
member.summary: Gets or sets assembly platform
member.value: Possible values are: x86, Itanium, x64, any cpu (default)

member.name: P:Dzonny.JScriptNet.Jsc.Autoref
member.summary: Gets or sest value indicating if assemblies are automatically referenced based on imported namespaces and fully-qualified names

member.name: P:Dzonny.JScriptNet.Jsc.Libraries
member.summary: Gets or sets additional directories to search in for references

member.name: P:Dzonny.JScriptNet.Jsc.References
member.summary: Gets or sets assembly files to reference metadata from

member.name: P:Dzonny.JScriptNet.Jsc.Win32Resources
member.summary: Gets or sets Win32 resource files

member.name: P:Dzonny.JScriptNet.Jsc.Resources
member.summary: Gets or sets embeded resources

member.name: P:Dzonny.JScriptNet.Jsc.LinkedResources
member.summary: Gets or sets linked resources

member.name: P:Dzonny.JScriptNet.Jsc.Debug
member.summary: Gets or sets value indicating if debugging information are emitted

member.name: P:Dzonny.JScriptNet.Jsc.Fast
member.summary: Gets or sets value indicating if some language features are turned off to allow better code generation

member.name: P:Dzonny.JScriptNet.Jsc.WarningsAsErrors
member.summary: Gets or sets value indicating if all warnings are treated as errors

member.name: P:Dzonny.JScriptNet.Jsc.WarningLevel
member.summary: Gets or sets warning level

member.name: P:Dzonny.JScriptNet.Jsc.Defines
member.summary: Gets or sets defined conditional compilation symbols

member.name: P:Dzonny.JScriptNet.Jsc.AllowPrintFunction
member.summary: Gets or sets value indicating if print() function is provided

member.name: P:Dzonny.JScriptNet.Jsc.NoStdLib
member.summary: Gets or sets value indicating if standard library (mscorlib.dll) is not imported and are changed to default off

member.name: P:Dzonny.JScriptNet.Jsc.VersionSafe
member.summary: Gets or sets value indicating default for members not marked override or hide

member.name: P:Dzonny.JScriptNet.Jsc.Files
member.summary: gets or sets files to complie

member.name: M:Dzonny.JScriptNet.Jsc.Execute
member.summary: Executes a task.
member.returns: true if the task executed successfully; otherwise, false.
